Package ZuulBad

Class NonPlayerCharacter

java.lang.Object
ZuulBad.NonPlayerCharacter
public class NonPlayerCharacter
extends java.lang.Object
This class creates a Non Player Character who can give messages when player enters a room and hints when player carries specific item
Author:
Katerina Matysova, Sarah Engelmayer, Daniel Birk

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> hints
    The HashMap containing all NPC Hints
    private static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> messages
    The HashMap containing all NPC Messages
    private java.lang.String wanteditem
    The item the NPC needs to give a hint

  • Constructor Details

    • NonPlayerCharacter

      public NonPlayerCharacter​(java.lang.String wanteditem)
      Constructor for the class NPC. In the constructor a HashMap with messages and a HashMap with hints are created. The values can be retrieved when the correct item is handed over.
      Parameters:
      wanteditem - the item wanted by NPC

  • Method Details

      Returns:
